actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States regarding the classification of certain articles of wearing apparel.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide that articles of apparel, except suits, are to be separately classified even if two or more such articles are imported together and designed to be sold together at retail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States regarding the classification of certain articles of wearing apparel.
